briefTitle: A Study of the Trabecular Micro-bypass Stent in Combination With Cataract Surgery in Subjects With Open Angle Glaucoma
officialTitle: A Study of the Glaukos Trabecular Micro-Bypass Stent in Combination With Cataract Surgery in Open Angle Glaucoma Subjects.
summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the iStent trabecular micro-bypass stent in reducing intraocular pressure (IOP) in subjects with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension and co-existing cataract.

primaryOutcome.measure: Intraocular Pressure (Measured in mm Hg) Less or Equal to 21 mm Hg on no Topical Hypotensive Meds

commonTop: Any BCVA loss greater than 1 line of vision at or after the 3 month visit
